body:
Adding the possibility to compile a VisIt plugin using spack independently
from the VisIt installation, itself with or without spack.
There is also a "local" version which is useful for local development.
Other sources and versions are exactly the ones of VisIt.
Note that it can be used to update a plugin in an older release of VisIt (when possible).
Here it is the "FFP" plugin.
title: New Package: visit-ffp
